explanations.A: Correct! 我的 (wǒ de) means my.
Correct! 你的 (nǐ de) means your.
Correct! 你好 (nǐ hǎo) means hello.
Correct! 谢谢 (xièxie) means thank you.
Correct! My is wǒ de — 我的.
Correct! Your is nǐ de — 你的.
Correct! Name is míngzi — 名字.
Correct! Hello is nǐ hǎo — 你好.
Correct! Thank you is xièxie — 谢谢.
Correct! Sorry is duìbuqǐ — 对不起.
Correct! 的 (de) shows possession or description, like ’s or of.
Correct! 们 (men) makes pronouns or people nouns plural.
Correct! 是 (shì) can mean is / are / am.
Correct! 在哪里 (zài nǎlǐ) means where.
Correct! 是 (shì) is the verb 'to be' in Chinese and covers is / are / am.
Correct! 谢谢 means thank you.
